${ModID}:UnleashedSmite.NAME: Unleashed Smite
${ModID}:UnleashedSmite.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Deal !D! damage. NL stslib:Persist !stslib:persist!.

${ModID}:SnowballStrike.NAME: Snowball Strike
${ModID}:SnowballStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL At the start of your next turn, add !M! *Dash *Slap to your hand.
${ModID}:SnowballStrike.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL At the start of your next turn, add !M! *Dash *Slaps to your hand.

${ModID}:DashSlap.NAME: Dash Slap
${ModID}:DashSlap.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:GrievousIgnite.NAME: Grievous Ignite
${ModID}:GrievousIgnite.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! ${ModID}:Ignite and !M! ${ModID}:Antiheal for each card in your hand. NL Exhaust.
${ModID}:GrievousIgnite.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! ${ModID}:Ignite and !M! ${ModID}:Antiheal for each card in your hand.

${ModID}:DualHeal.NAME: Dual Heal
${ModID}:DualHeal.DESCRIPTION: Heal !M! HP. NL Target heals !M! HP. NL Gain !${ModID}:m2! ${ModID}:Ghosted. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:PerfectClarity.NAME: Perfect Clarity
${ModID}:PerfectClarity.DESCRIPTION: Add !M! *Miracles into your hand. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:GhostingMaelstrom.NAME: Ghosting Maelstrom
${ModID}:GhostingMaelstrom.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a card while ${ModID}:Overextended, deal !M! damage to all enemies. NL Gain !${ModID}:m2! ${ModID}:Ghosted.

${ModID}:AggressiveTeleport.NAME: Aggressive Teleport
${ModID}:AggressiveTeleport.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, put a random Attack from your discard pile into your hand.
${ModID}:AggressiveTeleport.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the start of your turn, put a random Attack from your discard pile into your hand.

${ModID}:Flash.NAME: Flash
${ModID}:Flash.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Excess draw is converted into Ghosted.

${ModID}:Hexflash.NAME: Hexflash
${ModID}:Hexflash.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Draw !M! card. NL Exhaust. NL If retained for 3 turns, exhausts and adds *Flash to your hand.
${ModID}:Hexflash.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Draw !M! cards. NL Exhaust. NL If retained for 3 turns, exhausts and adds *Flash to your hand.
